docs.text: Free TON Wallet Originally, Free TON Wallet project was started by #137 Contest - Free TON Web Browser Extension . Along research phase our team made decision to develop a cross platform application to archive best user experience, due most of people around the World use several platforms same time. Right now we take a focus to fulfill Chrome Extension and Web-based versions with all necessary features. Build for Mobile and Desktop versions we plans to configure after code freeze. Find us Website - http://freeton-wallet.org/ Telegram Channel Google Group GitHub Installation Binary Releases of the wallet application available in our GitHub repostiry https://github.com/freeton-wallet/wallet/releases . There are good reason to verify signature: gpg --verify freeton-wallet-chrome-extenstion.zip.asc To install Chrome Extention from ZIP binary archive follow this manual . Publishing an extension to the extension stores is planned for near future. References #137 Contest Free TON wallet as a Chrome extension. PDF: Stage 1 (a local copy).
docs.title: Introduction

docs.text: Originally, Free TON Wallet project was started by #137 Contest - Free TON Web Browser Extension . Along research phase our team made decision to develop a cross platform application to archive best user experience, due most of people around the World use several platforms same time. Right now we take a focus to fulfill Chrome Extension and Web-based versions with all necessary features. Build for Mobile and Desktop versions we plans to configure after code freeze.

docs.text: Binary Releases of the wallet application available in our GitHub repostiry https://github.com/freeton-wallet/wallet/releases . There are good reason to verify signature: gpg --verify freeton-wallet-chrome-extenstion.zip.asc To install Chrome Extention from ZIP binary archive follow this manual . Publishing an extension to the extension stores is planned for near future.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: #137 Contest Free TON wallet as a Chrome extension. PDF: Stage 1 (a local copy).
docs.title: References

docs.text: Browser Extension Chrome Download desired version of binaries freeton-wallet-chrome-extenstion.zip and corresponding signature freeton-wallet-chrome-extenstion.zip.asc from https://github.com/freeton-wallet/wallet/releases Verify signature, to prevent maleware injection gpg --verify freeton-wallet-chrome-extenstion.zip.asc Switch your Chrome Extenstions into Developer mode . See for official documentation for details. Navigate to chrome://extensions Turn ON development mode toggle. Use button Load unpacked to upload ZIP binaries Use Free TON Wallet extension Firefox TBD Safari TBD
docs.title: Browser Extension

See for official documentation for details. Navigate to chrome://extensions Turn ON development mode toggle. Use button Load unpacked to upload ZIP binaries Use Free TON Wallet extension

docs.text: Devel Change Log 2021-04-03 Maxim Anurin Competitors : Add competitors page and review extraTON's solution. Work on Roadmap : Collect UI requirements, review TronLink and extraTON, add tasks to backlog. Draw a mindmap diagram to show UI form relations. Work on sources: Prototype widgets, Prototype Router, Prototype Wallet Service. 2021-03-21 Maxim Anurin Licensing : choose Apache 2.0 License for our sources, add LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt, write developer. Work on Roadmap : Collect contest requirements, review TronLink and grab few screenshots, add first tasks to backlog.

docs.text: Description The first and most popular Free TON wallet. Recommended by Free TON Community. Free TON wallet with the most users, coming in three versions (Chrome Wallet Extension/iOS/Android), and you're looking at the Chrome Wallet Extension for Free TON. Wallet features: - Native support of any open-sourced non-custodial Free TON wallets, e.g. - Original TON wallets (Wallet v. 3) - TON Labs’ wallets (SafeMultisig, SetCodeMultisig) - Random seed phrase generation - 12 or 24 words wallet initialization (based on wallet contract) - Wallet seed phrase backup and restoration - Public and private keys generation, backup, and restoration - Encrypted local key storage - Password protection - Support of sending a memo with messages (or encoded payload) About Free TON: Free TON is a fully decentralized self-governed blockchain focused on giving power back to the community through freedom of speech, information and software. It is a free, open-source network whose goal is to make an accessible ecosystem with Turing-complete smart contracts, governed by the principle of a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).
docs.title: Extension manifest.devel

docs.text: The first and most popular Free TON wallet. Recommended by Free TON Community. Free TON wallet with the most users, coming in three versions (Chrome Wallet Extension/iOS/Android), and you're looking at the Chrome Wallet Extension for Free TON. Wallet features: - Native support of any open-sourced non-custodial Free TON wallets, e.g. - Original TON wallets (Wallet v. 3) - TON Labs’ wallets (SafeMultisig, SetCodeMultisig) - Random seed phrase generation - 12 or 24 words wallet initialization (based on wallet contract) - Wallet seed phrase backup and restoration - Public and private keys generation, backup, and restoration - Encrypted local key storage - Password protection - Support of sending a memo with messages (or encoded payload) About Free TON: Free TON is a fully decentralized self-governed blockchain focused on giving power back to the community through freedom of speech, information and software. It is a free, open-source network whose goal is to make an accessible ecosystem with Turing-complete smart contracts, governed by the principle of a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Glossary H HDPATH For example Free TON use value m/44'/396'/0'/0 . Defines a logical hierarchy for deterministic wallets. Level 2 of the hierarchy describes a coin type in use. Originally was desined for Bitcoin as BIP-0044. See also: BIP-0044 SLIP-0044 : Registered coin types for BIP-0044 M Mnemonic Seed Mnemonic phrase, mnemonic seed , or seed phrase are defined as a secret group of words that represent a wallet. When used in sequence they allow access to the cryptocurrencies stored within. "Mnemonic" just means a memory aid such as rhymes, abbreviations and songs that help you remember something else. Safety Warning Do not take photos or screenshots. Other apps can get access to them. Write everything down on paper and store it in a safe place. See also: Seed phrase Mnemonic phrase W Wallet A word Wallet is a little bit abstract thing. Different applications have different meaing of the terms. We use the word Wallet to define crypto wallet on the blockchain (smart contract). Like a: TON wallets SafeMultisig SetCodeMultisig
docs.title: Glossary

docs.text: For example Free TON use value m/44'/396'/0'/0 . Defines a logical hierarchy for deterministic wallets. Level 2 of the hierarchy describes a coin type in use. Originally was desined for Bitcoin as BIP-0044. See also: BIP-0044 SLIP-0044 : Registered coin types for BIP-0044
docs.title: HDPATH

docs.text: Mnemonic phrase, mnemonic seed , or seed phrase are defined as a secret group of words that represent a wallet. When used in sequence they allow access to the cryptocurrencies stored within. "Mnemonic" just means a memory aid such as rhymes, abbreviations and songs that help you remember something else. Safety Warning Do not take photos or screenshots. Other apps can get access to them. Write everything down on paper and store it in a safe place. See also: Seed phrase Mnemonic phrase

docs.text: Любой исходный код в проекте Free TON Wallet лицензируется под Apache License Version 2.0 Для удовлетворения требований лицензирования, нужно выполнять следующее: Каждый репозиторий, в корне содержит файл LICENSE.txt Сopyright notice , на выбор, вставляется в шапку каждого исходного файла, либо в файл NOTICE в корне проекта (если нет технической возможности вставлять в шапку каджого файла) Copyright 2021 Free TON Wallet Team Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.
docs.title: RU

docs.text: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-howto.html https://www.gnu.org/graphics/license-logos.html https://habr.com/ru/post/243091/#Apache

docs.text: Roadmap Stage 1 Submission Due Date: May 12, 2021, 22:59 UTC Infrastructure Register domain freeton-wallet.org . Maxim Anurin Register Google Groups https://groups.google.com/g/freeton-wallet freeton-wallet@googlegroups.com . Maxim Anurin Register Publisher in the developer console for Google Groups freeton-wallet@googlegroups.com . Maxim Anurin [In progress] Experemental publish to Chrome Web Store. Maxim Anurin Documentation Setup MkDocs-based repository . Maxim Anurin Technical paper . Maxim Anurin Architecture in details Detailed user scenarios Licensing . Maxim Anurin UI/UX Development Unlock Setup Master Password Main Window Confirm Mnemonic Phrase Show Mnemonic Phrase Enter Wallet Name Restore Mode Selector Restore By Mnemonic Phrase Restore By Private Key Import Mode Selector Settings Address Book Nodes Language Auto Lock About Us Address Details Receive Send Application Development Setup skelet Choose multilanguage approach. Write dev notes. Choose DI pattern https://habr.com/ru/post/446134/ https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:ylm6CKlwkjcJ:https://inostudio.com/blog/articles-develop/flutter-bloc-i-di-nye-truby-ili-kak-kontrolirovat-zavisimosti-v-kode/+&cd=4&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=ua Choose state pattern https://flutterdevs.com/blog/bloc-pattern-in-flutter-part-1/ TON Node Client Mnemonic Phrase Generator Encryptor Backlog Documentation Setup MkDocs-based repository Создать репозиторий с initial данными. CI для автосборки snapshot версий документации. Technical paper В соответствии с Contest proposal , артифакты должны содержать технические заметки в PDF формате которые описывают архитектуру и пользовательские сценарии. !!! note "Цитата" Technical paper in PDF format explaining the architecture in details along with detailed user scenarios Данный проект документации может быть експортирован в PDF с помощью плагинов, например mkdocs-with-pdf . Потому не имеет смысла писать эти Technical paper отдельно, а просто включить эти документы в публичную версию документации. Architecture in details TBD Detailed user scenarios TBD Temp (to be removed) English language of the interface; Support of Google Chrome; Absence of analytical trackers (Google Analytics, Yandex Metrika, etc.); Support of mainnet and testnet(s); On-chain activity history (transactions, messages, contract interactions, etc.); Any calls that require the user’s keys must ask for the password input to decrypt them from the local storage. Native support of any open-sourced non-custodial Free TON wallets, e.g.: Original TON wallets (Wallet v. 3); TON Labs’ wallets (SafeMultisig, SetCodeMultisig); Random seed phrase generation; 12 or 24 words wallet initialization (based on wallet contract); Wallet seed phrase backup and restoration; Public and private keys generation, backup, and restoration; Encrypted local key storage; Password protection; Support of sending a memo with messages (or encoded payload). Multilanguage support; The extension is published in the Chrome store; Support of additional browsers (Firefox, Brave, Edge, Safari, Opera); Browser notifications on events; Detailed and easily understandable charts explaining the architecture and business processes; Brevity; Mostly everyday English to facilitate understanding; Readiness to participate in the implementation of the solution in the next stage; Verifiable extension security along with the process to verify the equality of published version with source code. Technical paper in PDF format explaining the architecture in details along with detailed user scenarios; Source code for all modules published in any open repository like GitHub, GitLab, BitBucket, etc.
docs.title: Roadmap

docs.text: MacOS specific brew install gnupg pinentry-mac echo "pinentry-program /usr/local/bin/pinentry-mac" >> ~/.gnupg/gpg-agent.conf gpgconf --kill gpg-agent Generate Key gpg --full-generate-key gpg --export --armor <your_name>@freeton-wallet.org Add GPG Public Key into GitLab/GitHub Setup Commit Signin git config --local commit.gpgsign true
docs.title: Signcommit.devel

docs.title: Software Architecture

docs.text: Stage 1 ( #137 Contest ) Эта фаза подразумевает создание Flutter приложения для управления колешьками блокчейна Free TON. Использование Flutter дает возможность компиляции данного приложения как Chrome Extension (цель контеста), Android App, iOS App. Overview Acceptance Check List Must Have 2 Document - How we help your security Memonic - read/write via images (prevent clipboard sniffer, keylogger malewares) Must Have MVP Application: The general technical architecture of the solution including all of the features listed below in the hard evaluation criteria section, along with the proposed customer journeys Архитектурный документ: Detailed technical specification of the proposed implementation with the justification of the selected approach: smart contracts, integration layer, interfaces Name and contact information of the contestant for communication (Telegram username, e-mail) English language of the interface Support of Google Chrome Absence of analytical trackers (Google Analytics, Yandex Metrika, etc.) Support of mainnet and testnet(s) On-chain activity history (transactions, messages, contract interactions, etc.) Any calls that require the user’s keys must ask for the password input to decrypt them from the local storage. Support Original TON wallets (Wallet v. 3) Support TON Labs’ wallet ( SafeMultisig Support TON Labs’ wallet SetCodeMultisig ) Random seed phrase generation 12 or 24 words wallet initialization (based on wallet contract) Wallet seed phrase backup and restoration Public and private keys generation, backup, and restoration Encrypted local key storage Password protection Support of sending a memo with messages (or encoded payload). Technical paper in PDF format explaining the architecture in details along with detailed user scenarios Source code for all modules published in any open repository like GitHub, GitLab, BitBucket, etc. All works published under this contest enter the public domain immediately after the publication; The work should use any copyleft license (preferably Apache 2.0 or GNU GPL v. 3). Nice To Have Multilanguage support The extension is published in the Chrome store Support of additional browsers (Firefox, Brave, Edge, Safari, Opera) Browser notifications on events Detailed and easily understandable charts explaining the architecture and business processes Brevity Mostly everyday English to facilitate understanding Readiness to participate in the implementation of the solution in the next stage Verifiable extension security along with the process to verify the equality of published version with source code. Licensing Изучить различия лицензий которые предлагаются на выбор в контесте: The work should use any copyleft license (preferably Apache 2.0 or GNU GPL v. 3). LICENSE.txt и NOTICE.txt Написать заметку для разработчиков о том, как правильно использовать/применять лицензию. Licensing choosen Apache 2.0 License for our sources, add LICENSE.txt and NOTICE.txt, write developer. Widgets Unlock Unlock - форма для входа (разюлокировки) требующая ввода Master Password Setup Master Password Setup Master Password - форма приветствия на первом запуске приложения. Форма предлагает пользователю придумать пароль который, в дальнейшем, будет использован для повторного входа и шифрования пользовательских данных. Реализовать class SetupMasterPasswordWidget extends DialogStatelessWidget Правила проверки пароля Confirm Mnemonic Phrase Show Mnemonic Phrase Enter Wallet Name TBD Restore Mode Selector Restore Mode Selector - форма выбора режима инициализации кошелька. Реализовать class RestoreModeSelectorWidget extends StatelessWidget Restore By Mnemonic Phrase Restore By Private Key Import Mode Selector Main Window Settings Address Book Nodes Language TBD Auto Lock About Us TBD Address Details TBD Receive TBD Send TBD
docs.title: Stage 1 ([#137 Contest](https://gov.freeton.org/proposal?proposalAddress=0:eb0476d5b03c64009e3782a79bcc431334abf54480cf9d36834743445d534a86))

docs.text: Эта фаза подразумевает создание Flutter приложения для управления колешьками блокчейна Free TON. Использование Flutter дает возможность компиляции данного приложения как Chrome Extension (цель контеста), Android App, iOS App.

Technical paper in PDF format explaining the architecture in details along with detailed user scenarios Source code for all modules published in any open repository like GitHub, GitLab, BitBucket, etc. All works published under this contest enter the public domain immediately after the publication; The work should use any copyleft license (preferably Apache 2.0 or GNU GPL v. 3).

docs.text: Technical Stack Wallet Application is written in Flutter / Dart Web platform: Free TON Blockchain communication via official TON Javascript Web SDK with own interop facace library Data Storage in browser LocalStorage Sensetive data encryption via AES-CBC (with PKCS7 padding) Password derivation using PBKDF2 Using Extension Manifest V2 Mobile platform - Not impelmented yet Desktop platform - Not impelmented yet Documentation generated by MkDocs
docs.title: Technical Stack

docs.text: Wallet Application is written in Flutter / Dart Web platform: Free TON Blockchain communication via official TON Javascript Web SDK with own interop facace library Data Storage in browser LocalStorage Sensetive data encryption via AES-CBC (with PKCS7 padding) Password derivation using PBKDF2 Using Extension Manifest V2 Mobile platform - Not impelmented yet Desktop platform - Not impelmented yet Documentation generated by MkDocs
docs.title: Technical Stack

docs.text: Use Cases Create Account Wizzard A Create Account Wizzard flow allows user to setup new account (mnemonic seed + first keys pair). The private key and mnemonic seed are encrypting before save into data storage. graph TD A["fa:fa-user"] A-->B[fa:fa-keyboard-o Enter Account Name] B-->C{"fa:fa-spinner Choose Creation Mode"} C-->|New Mnemonic Seed|D[fa:fa-asterisk Generate Mnemonic Seed] D-->E[fa:fa-keyboard-o Confirm Mnemonic Seed] C-->|Restore Mnemonic Seed|D1[fa:fa-keyboard-o Enter Mnemonic Seed] E-->F[fa:fa-keyboard-o Derive Keys Pair] D1-->F C-->|Restore Private Key|G[fa:fa-keyboard-o Enter Private Key] H["fa:fa-lock Encrypt And Save Account Data"] F-->H G-->H
docs.title: Use Cases

docs.text: Use Cases Launch the application At launch time the application check data storage and detect necessity of wizzard flow. For example, at first launch, the application make wizzard for Master Password and create a first account. graph TD A["A fa:fa-user starts the application"] A-->B{"fa:fa-spinner Is first run?"} B-->|Data storage is not initialized|C[fa:fa-keyboard-o Setup Master Password Wizzard Flow] B-->|Data storage is empty|D[fa:fa-key Create Account Wizzard Flow] B-->|General usage|E[fa:fa-home Sign In using Master Password] E-->F[fa:fa-home Home Screen] C-->D D-->F
docs.title: Use Cases
